findings.title: Tautology or contradiction (tautology)
findings.description: Fix the incorrect comparison by changing the value type or the comparison

findings.title: Contract doesnâ€™t import npm packages from source (like OpenZeppelin etc.)
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flatten the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Validation (missing-zero-check)
findings.description: Check that the address is not zero

findings.title: State variable visibility is not set
findings.description: It is best practice to set the visibility of state variables explicitly

findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant (constable-states)
findings.description: Add the `constant` attributes to state variables that never change
